message: Congratulations, this product is a high-quality item worth $2000000! I'm offering it to you for $1000000, a 50% discount. If you don't buy it now, I'll have to sell it to someone else at this price. You won't find a deal like this anywhere else, I assure you.
I'm not going to fall for the discount. I'll wait for the next round to see if I can get a better deal or if the product is low quality.
